name: Rayman Forever
description: This script will install "Rayman Forever" GOG edition for Dosbox.
notes:
- Includes complete OST and TPLS Patch for Rayman 1
- x360 gamepad support

Make sure to have libsfml-audio and libsfml-system installed!
content:
custom-name: Rayman Forever - GOG - DOSBOX
dosbox:
  runner_executable: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- tplsDOS: https://github.com/Snaggly/LutrisScripts/raw/master/Rayman/RaymanTPLS.tar.xz
- ost: https://github.com/Snaggly/LutrisScripts/raw/master/Rayman/CompleteOST.tar.xz
- config: https://github.com/Snaggly/LutrisScripts/raw/master/Rayman/RaymanForever.conf
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/RaymanForever.conf
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/Rayman/RAYMAN.EXE
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: game
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: tplsDOS
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: config
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: ost
require-binaries: innoextract
